title: Member Solutions Provides Anti-Bullying Curriculum Ideas and Guidance to Support Cause During National Bullying Prevention Month
text:
In honor of National Bullying Prevention Month, Member Solutions will provide anti-bullying curriculum ideas to the Martial Arts business community. The company will also participate in educational activities throughout October, and raise funds to support the bullying prevention movement.
Hatboro, Pennsylvania (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Member Solutions today announced that it is participating in a month-long campaign to increase awareness, education and prevention of bullying during National Bullying Prevention Month.
Throughout October, the company will share educational resources and bullying prevention curriculum ideas from Martial Arts industry leaders. All content will be available on the company’s Bullying Prevention page .
Member Solutions will also raise and match funds in support of bullying prevention, and participate in activities throughout October, such as Unity Day on Wednesday, October 21st.
“Many of the Martial Arts schools we serve make bullying prevention part of their curriculum. It’s a movement that we’re proud to take part in,” said Kristie Matheson, President of Member Solutions. “By creating awareness, we’re helping families learn how to recognize bullying behaviors and how to prevent it in their community."
National Bullying Prevention Month was founded by PACER’s National Bullying Prevention Center in October 2006. Today the campaign is recognized in schools, organizations and communities throughout the United States. The campaign is also supported by the National Education Association, American Federation of Teachers and National PTA in partnership with PACER.
All donations and matched contributions from Member Solutions will go to PACER’s National Bullying Prevention Center, where educational resources and services are provided to parents, schools, teens and youth. Donations made to the center help keep services and resources free of charge to families in need.
For more information on National Bullying Prevention Month, visit PACER’s National Bullying Prevention Center website .
About Member Solutions
Since 1991, Member Solutions has built its business on an unwavering commitment to serving clients in the Martial Arts and other Fitness market segments. The company operates a proprietary payment processing platform, and is the leading provider of billing, servicing and business support to more than 3,000 membership businesses in the United States, Canada and Australia. The company also offers myVolo web-based software for front-desk member management and Event Manager online registration software. Both software solutions are fully integrated with the company’s Level One PCI-compliant payment processing platform. For more information, visit MemberSolutions.com .
